channel.title: [562]Working IpBan + IpMute?[562]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have recently setup a server (not gunna say the name).
I was wondering if there was anyway to add a working IpBan and IpMute.

Please Help!
Add my msn ben.gamer@live.co.uk if u don't wanna post here :)
